name: HiperCube
description:
HiperCube Take the challenge and get off the 4D labyrinth!

HiperCube is a game which lets you try yourself in 4D space. Go through a 13 different four-dimensional mazes and unlock infinite, random generated level!

Game description

You are placed in labyrinth and your goal is to find way out which is marked as a yellow double-square. Each maze conteins three three-dimensional spaces - something like "floors" on fourth axis. Every space has it's own colour - red, green or blue, and you can change currently occupied space in special gates which might be explained as a "stairs" on fourth direction.

Would you like to change something?

If you had any comments and ideas how to improve the game, or want to see something in it, feel free to contact me, and I will add it.

Looking for something special?

Would you like to give someone an unusual gift? Are you looking for something unique for yourself? Don't wait and contact me for personalised game! Personalisation may contain: custom welcome screen, dedication at startup or hidden, special in-game content (wishes,  jokes, personal messages, et cetera). This feature might be additionally payable.
